name: Mari's Adventure
description:
Mari, the octopus. Is an octopus girl who is looking for her family. She lost them when she was a kid. Traveling across the sea, she encounter many creatures, from tiny to big one. Join Mari with her adventure to find her family again!

Features

  • Everything dies in one hit (You and the enemies)

Controls

  • A / D to Move
  • W to Shoot
  • Left Shift to Dash
  • Space to Jump
  • ESC to Pause

Credits

Art:

  • Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/)

Music:

  • Demon Lord by Scrabbit (https://opengameart.org/content/demon-lord)
  • SFXr
